explains: n. 割礼；净心；[外科] 包皮环割术

sentences.en: Female circumcision is practised on 2 million girls a year.
sentences.cn: 每年有2百万个女孩被施行女性割礼手术。

sentences.en: Philippine city holds mass circumcision for youths.
sentences.cn: 菲律宾为青少年举行大型割礼。

sentences.en: Male circumcision seems to limit the disease’s spread.
sentences.cn: 男性割礼似乎对限制传播亦有所助。
